mapper.select: SELECT A.ELAPSE_MONTH elapseMonth , A.FEE_TYPE_CD feeTypeCode1 , A.FEE_TYPE_NM feeTypeName1 , A.LIMIT_ONCE limitOnce1 , A.LIMIT_TOTAL limitTotal1 , B.FEE_TYPE_CD feeTypeCode2 , B.FEE_TYPE_NM feeTypeName2 , B.LIMIT_ONCE limitOnce2 , B.LIMIT_TOTAL limitTotal2 FROM TB_FEE_TYPE_LIMIT A LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_FEE_TYPE_LIMIT B ON A.ELAPSE_MONTH =B.ELAPSE_MONTH WHERE A.FEE_TYPE_CD ='100' AND B.FEE_TYPE_CD= '200'
